name: The Silver Ribbon
description:
Deirdre is a sweet and smiling girl who lives with her father. One day, he buys her a nice silver hair ribbon at a street stand. At night, in the girl's bedroom, the ribbon transforms into a beautiful silver-haired fox and turns Deirdre's home into a magical forest, turning the girl the size of a mouse. Deirdre must make her way through the forest to find the fox and return to normal.

Simple platformer made in Construct 2 for Videogames class in EASD Valencia.
